checkCredentials(ActionEvent) - Method in class application.MainCtrl
This method checks in the database for an e-mail-password match and moves to the customer page or the staff page depending on the credentials

This method takes as input a date and calculates if this day is in the future or in the past.

This method changed shows the available movies for a specific day the user has chosen
chooseMovie() - Method in class customer.DateSelectionCtrl
This method updates the picture and the description of the movie that the user picks and updated the Time field with the available screening times of this movie
